page.title: 03LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: MOST PEOPLE MAKE THEIR OWN ENTERTAINMENT AND SPEND A LOT OF THEIR LEISURE TIME AT HOME ; PLAYING, GARDENING,COOKING ,MAKING MUSIC, WATCHING TV. POPULAR{SPORTING {ACTIVITIES}, INCLUDE SWIMMING, RIDING,BADMINTON,,DARTS,FISHING AND SHOOTING.{WALKING}IN THE COUNTRYSIDE IS VERY POPULAR. LOCAL{CLUBS AND {SOCIETIES}ARE SENIOR CITIZENS, W.I., COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION,LOCAL HISTORY SOCIETY, ST TEATH SCHOOL ASSOCIATION ,BADMINTON CLUB,CUBS,SCOUTS,BROWNIES, GUIDES AND LIONS.NEARLY ALL LEISURE ACTIVITIES TAKE PLACE WITHIN 10 MILES OF HOME. ON AVERAGE,ADULTS SPEND ABOUT 20 HOURS PER A WEEK WATCHING{TELEVISION}.THE MOST POPULAR PROGRAMMES ARE SOAP OPERAS,NEWS,SITUATION COMEDIES AND WILDLIFE PROGRAMMES .
